prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_k7x9s2",
  "name": "Family Flexitarian Regional Twists (SA & Mediterranean, 15-30, Mild, Balanced)",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "SouthAfrican",
      "Mediterranean"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "RegionalTwist"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Chermoula Hake with Bulgur Herb Salad",
  "description": "Pan-seared hake brushed with chermoula, served over a bright bulgur, tomato, cucumber, and parsley salad. A mild SA–Mediterranean weeknight plate ready in under 30 minutes.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1) Rinse bulgur in a sieve.",
    "2) Dice tomato and cucumber.",
    "3) Roughly chop parsley leaves.",
    "4) Mince garlic.",
    "5) Zest and juice the lemon into separate small bowls.",
    "6) Pat dry hake fillets; season both sides with a pinch of salt and black pepper.",
    "7) Stir chermoula with 1 teaspoon olive oil to loosen for brushing."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1) Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; stir in bulgur and a pinch of salt, reduce heat, cover, and simmer 10–12 minutes until tender. Drain excess water if needed and fluff.",
    "2) While bulgur cooks, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large nonstick pan over medium heat.",
    "3) Brush tops of hake fillets with half the chermoula; place fillets chermoula-side down in the pan and cook 3–4 minutes.",
    "4) Brush the exposed sides with remaining chermoula, flip, and cook 2–3 minutes more until the fish flakes easily.",
    "5) In a bowl, combine warm bulgur, tomato, cucumber, parsley, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice, and remaining olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper to taste and toss.",
    "6) Plate bulgur herb salad and top with chermoula hake. Serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "bulgur",
      "quantity": "1 cup (dry)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "water",
      "quantity": "2 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "hake fillets",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "patted dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chermoula",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cucumber",
      "quantity": "1 small",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zested and juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Fish",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "RegionalTwist"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
